item.description:
Hi Everyone,

You must RESERVE WITH CRABAPPEL WW-  the RSVP here is just who is maybe going, planning on going, or already paid up.

http://www.crabapplewhitewater.com/massachusetts/deerfield-monroe_bridge.shtml

I can not cover your fee so its up to you to contat and pay them.

The time of 9:00 am at the MEETING SHACK and June 12 are now confirmed with a request for Frank as our guide for the first 6-8 of us.

Please call Crabappel and set up you reservation and use AL Reigins as your group reference so you will be grouped together instead of being assigned to a random boat.

 

Yes this is the "ONLY" White Water event and most expensive event of the year.

BELOW ARE THE RAFTING GUIDES YOU WILL MEAT.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

I am listing this particular event because its an all day adventure and it includes everything from the full rafting with Frank as our raft guide (some of yo know we can do things that other guids can't or won't do),  The bus trip to and from the ACTUAL rafting put ins and take outs, and the INCLUDED HILLBILLY "Barbie q Lunch" right after.

Here is our bus to the PUT IN SPOT.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

There may even be some BANJO PLAYING at the event by the best in the South..

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Carpooling will be discussed with those actually going and that will be a few days prior to the event day.

I know money is tight for everyone, that is why i have tried to present events that save as much as possible, 5 here 5 there, 20, on and on is saved..so in effect this event is paid for by saving in other areas (COST BALANCED).

 

UPDATE:

WATER AND AIR TEMPS ARE HIGH ENOUGH AND WET SUITS ARE AVAILABLE IF YOU DESIRE THEM

:  " June 12" <~~~~~~ DEERFIELD RIVER MONROE BRIDGE SECTION EVENT

 


The DILLIVERANCE River Monroe Bridge Section will have you

  "SQUEELING LIKE A PYGG" .

 

 

 

 

 

Its the Best whitewater in southern New England. These are some of the first scheduled dam releases of 2011 on the exciting Class III-IV stretch of river. Take advantage of the early season price - $95pp. Save $15pp.


Last years trip in Vermont:  http://www.meetup.com/Hartford-County-Rivers-To-Shore-Area-Kayakers-CT/events/12205657/

Please....Im only interested in hearing from people that are adventurous, in good mental and physical shape who are looking forward to an enjoyable social event ( if 15 year olds allowed you will do fine) but NO COMPLAINING WHIMPS on this trip..

Since a few of us went in the late Fall Season recently, here is a different river, its closer and has some interesting rapids also.

Some of the info on this particular river area:

A COMMENT FROM ONE OF YOUR GUIDES:

HOWDY FOLKS : On This River you gonna be on da-> Marilyn Monroe Suicide Bridge Section.

You will see Big White Wet and Wild Water Excitement above the Berkinstocks in this area.

The Marylin Monroe Suicide Bridge trip is full of big Killer waves and fast wild whitewater action that will blow your skirts up into the wind and have you piss your pants many times over (if you are even wearing them on this kind of trip)  !

 

Junior usually goes down this river fully NAKED while standing up and PEEING on the FISHERMEN!!!

The fun and torture starts right below the Marylin Monroe Suicide Bridge and the God Damn DAM.

As you are thrown into the refreshing water with Class II warm-up rapids ( you will be cold until the Libido increases)  Then its warm up to your water spanking Paddle Good Buddy and we head to a stretch of bigger, Class III HUMPS, Yes its just like the Bumps and drops just like Marilin Monroe had.

You will enjoy the Orgasm Rush of challenges such as "Devil's Odds against your sole and life" and "Landslide into the pleasure of HELL."

Along the way our expert guides will take time to play and work the river in a "surfing hole of endless Pools with depths of Delight" or two.

KEEP YOUR MOUTH CLOSED --Don't swallow the water since the fishermen pee in the river and Juniour takes a bath in it, the picture below shows why.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Each rapid gets more excitingly  scary as the trip builds toward the final most difficult and orgasmic rapids of the day, "Dragon's Ripping and Biting Tooth from BUBBA" (its the kids father's monument now) and the Arnold Ziffel Pitch Fork which will Poke you into "The Terminator Pork Sausage Squeeze and Bite rapid."

 

 

 

Below is the Kid who's father has a memorial dedicated to his BIG Teeth right in the middle of the RIVER.

BUBBA was Beaver Chewing on a 200 year old oak tree and it fell in the water. As the tree blocked the flow of the whole river current - BUBBA then  gulped too much water because he got his teeth stuck under the tree as he tried to get out of the flow.

POOR BUBBA !

Rest in Peas. And your Corn too. 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

These rapids require precise maneuvering by your guide with strong spanking and paddling by each rafter or else you will become body parts along the shore or you will be like a un-cooked sausage that has burst littering the pristine waterways.

Good runs through these Class IV rapids climax with a big wet drenching orgasm of waves and an awesome day of whitewater action way up above the Berkenstocks giving you a smile that you need.

A Tasty Sizzeling Smoked Body Part Cookout is included back in "Charlie on a Mount" on a smoking grille , you will see and smell the parts cooking as we arrive...MMMMmmm MMMMmm Good.. You will say..."We will never go hungry again".

The Grill Master is below holding the grilling fork in hand yelling:

"COME AND GIT YOU WIGGELIN GRUBs , thay hot and steamy  !!!"

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

CornFed Momma "THE COOK's Wife" will serve you up you meal on her favourite trash can lids

to us as soon as she gets out of the Kayk full of her damm KFC chicken.

:

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Only the Finger licking Good parts is also left if you like the boney option, she ate the meat and has the bones left for you to crunch on..

al-r

For RESERVATIONS. Please give us a call 7 days a week at 1-800-553-7238 or send us an  e-mail . Sincerely, The Peabody & The Mooney Families

  http://www.crabapplewhitewater.com/

Driving directions and other info will be e mailed to you by Crabappel once you have set up your reso with them.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the Crabappel Building, I will be wearing my Orange PYGG Hunting Hat.
item.why: ~~~~> Its actually a healthy form of excersize and a mental challenge along with being a great social event throughout the entire day.

group.who: River and Shore Kayak-r's of CT
group.name: ~~~~HARTFORD COUNTY RIVERS & CT SHORE KAYAK GROUP~~~~ HCR-SK

item.name: ~>June 12 <~ White Water RAFTING @ DILLIVERANCE RIV MONROE BRIDGE, CHARLEMONT MA
